{"id":536249383,"lang":"cpp","time":"8Â months","timestamp":1628594280,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/536249383/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Happy Number","memory":"5.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    long long sumSquare(int n)\n    {\n        long long sum = 0;\n        while(n != 0)\n        {\n            sum += pow(n % 10, 2);\n            n /= 10;\n        }\n        return sum;\n    }\n    \n    bool isHappy(int n) \n    {\n        long long sumSlow = sumSquare(n);\n        long long fastSum = sumSquare(sumSlow);\n        \n        if(sumSlow == 1 || fastSum == 1)\n            return true;\n        \n        while(sumSlow != fastSum)\n        {\n            sumSlow = sumSquare(sumSlow);\n            fastSum = sumSquare(sumSquare(fastSum));\n            \n            if(sumSlow == 1 || fastSum == 1)\n                return true;\n        }\n        \n        return false;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"happy-number"}
